longBusinessSummary: Epigral Limited manufactures and sells chlor-alkali and related derivatives in India and internationally. The company offers chlorinated polyvinyl chloride (CPVC) resins, epichlorohydrin, chloromethanes value chain, hydrogen peroxide, caustic soda, chlorine, hydrogen, and caustic potash products. It also engages in the trading of agrochemical products. It serves various sectors, including CPVC pipes and fittings, windmills, construction, paints and coatings, electronics, water treatment, agrochemicals, pharmaceuticals, refineries, soap and detergents, fluoropolymers, paper and pulp, textiles, alumina, polyurethane foam, lithium, and polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE) pipes. The company was formerly known as Meghmani Finechem Limited and changed its name to Epigral Limited in August 2023. Epigral Limited was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
